Package A4_Flights

Interface PolicyRules

public interface PolicyRules
Rules a flight must obey to conform to airline policy.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkCrew()
    Does the flight have the required minimum number of crew members?
    boolean checkPassengers()
    Does the flight have the required minimum number of passengers?
    boolean checkTime()
    Does the flight have an acceptable departure time?
    boolean checkWeight()
    Does the flight have an acceptable total weight?

  • Method Details

    • checkCrew

      boolean checkCrew()
      Does the flight have the required minimum number of crew members?
      Returns:
      true if the number of crew is acceptable

    • checkPassengers

      boolean checkPassengers()
      Does the flight have the required minimum number of passengers?
      Returns:
      true if the number of passengers is acceptable

    • checkTime

      boolean checkTime()
      Does the flight have an acceptable departure time?
      Returns:
      true if the departure time is acceptable

    • checkWeight

      boolean checkWeight()
      Does the flight have an acceptable total weight?
      Returns:
      true if the total weight
